name: Puteri Bulan
description:
Puteri Bulan is a 2D platformer game inspired by a Malaysian folklore princess in the 16th century. The princess' name is Puteri Zaleha and she was the daughter of Sultan Sulaiman Syah. According to the legend, Puteri Zaleha was born with white blood and she is known as “Puteri Lindungan Bulan''.

In the first level, players take on the role of Puteri Mariam, Puteri Zaleha's sister as she embarks on a perilous journey to save Zaleha from impending danger.
